description: The ultimate in comfort has arrived. Keep warm and extra cozy in this Men’s Heavy Henley Sweater on colder days, whether you’re lounging or trekking through snow-covered trails. Luxuriously soft, perfectly thick, and versatile enough to wear pretty much anywhere. Button it up for a more refined look, or keep it open and casual.
name: Smartwool Heavy Henley Sweater - Mens

specs.value: 88% Recycled Nylon, 12% Elastane. Exclusive of Decoration
